release.action: Fixed bug in specs and implementation of DayPeriod.getNbOfDaysInPeriod. Since this is an inclusive interval, we need to add 1 day.
Added test cases for DayPeriod.

After fighting with Period, it turns out we have 2 semantics in there that are not compatible. Created DayPeriod as a period of days (with no more accurate time description), als a closed interval. Period is a period between to times, right half-open. Some methods in Period are deprecated now.

The AutomaticPropertyConverter now will use the component type of arrays, if the JSF component has a value binding to an array property. This enables us to use this converter also for SelectMany... components.
Inclusive duration method in Period.
French messages for EnterpriseNumbers.
